sentences.sContent: She had to wear a brace after the accident.
sentences.sCn: 出事以后她只得使用支架。

sentences.sContent: Wait until we’ve braced the ladder.
sentences.sCn: 等我们把梯子支撑住再说。

trans.tranOther: something that is used to strengthen or support something, or to make it stiff
to make something stronger by supporting it
